instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'We Do Not Weight Box' USP prominently on the Product Page and Cart.
Use the Red (#9B111E) for primary actions (Add to Cart, Checkout) to stimulate appetite and urgency.
Use Gold (#D4AF37) for borders, accents, and premium badges.
Ensure the PWA feels 'native' by disabling text selection on UI elements and using proper touch targets.
The 'Language Toggle' (EN/HI) should be easily accessible in the Header.
Mock the 'Checkout' process with simple UPI/COD options as per constraints.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'Added to cart').
For the 'Admin Dashboard', simplify the layout but keep the Red/Gold accents for consistency.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.animation_policy: Use smooth, staggered animations for lists. No 'transition: all'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.accessibility: Ensure text contrast > 4.5:1. Use ARIA labels for icon-only buttons.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.dark_mode_strategy: The design is LIGHT MODE focused. If dark mode is implemented, map Cream -> Dark Charcoal (#1A1A1A) and Red -> Brighter Red (#FF4D4D).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.component_reuse: Check /components/ui before building new ones. Customize Shadcn components via tailwind classes.
